column4: Does anyone know the package I need to be able to watch online Windows Media videos, ie youtube.com?
I think youtube is flash.  Either way, read https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats
Oh, and there's a beta of flash 9 for linux if you're interested
If you aren't using Windows, not much sense keeping it.  I wiped mine after it had been dormant like 6 months, but I'm kind of slow that way.
